meanings.definition: To make a smooth transition from one topic or section to another.
meanings.sent1: She will segue from talking about her favorite book to discussing her upcoming vacation.
meanings.sent2: The speaker will segue from the introduction to the main points of the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The magician will segue from pulling a rabbit out of a hat to making it disappear.
meanings.sent4: The music seamlessly segues from a slow melody to an upbeat rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset segue into the darkness of the night sky.

meanings.definition: A smooth transition from one topic or section to another.
meanings.sent1: The segue between the two songs was flawless.
meanings.sent2: His speech had a perfect segue from the introduction to the main topic.
meanings.sent3: The segue between the appetizers and the main course was unexpected but delightful.
meanings.sent4: The segue in the movie from the action scene to the emotional moment was well-executed.
meanings.sent5: The segue in the dance performance from a solo to a group routine was impressive.
